iti68:2.1: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, rago appahino, doso appahino, moho appahino—
iti68:2.2: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘baddho marassa patimukkassa marapaso yathakamakaraniyo papimato’.
iti68:2.3: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, rago pahino, doso pahino, moho pahino—
iti68:2.4: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘abaddho marassa omukkassa marapaso na yathakamakaraniyo papimato’”ti.
iti68:4.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
